title: Afghanistan Withdrawal by US May Prove Bigger Problem for Europe
content:
1. Afghanistan Withdrawal by US May Prove Bigger Problem for Europe  Bloomberg
  2. Whats next for the millions of Afghanistan refugees displaced by the Taliban takeover  ABC News
  3. Taliban would take back Europe's Afghan deportees to face courts, says spokesman  Reuters
  4. EU ministers meet to discuss Afghanistan, refugees  Associated Press
  5. EU plans €600m package for Afghanistan’s neighbours to avert refugee crisis  Financial Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
